trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> You would recognize the rustle of this corn anywhere.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_SEQ_01<tab>Once again you cross paths with the Cornservant. As fortune would have it, they stopped in Wachunpelo upon hearing the rumbling of a stomach in need. Ever wont to see the people of Tural well-fed, they bid you help them offer aid to a peckish young Pelupelu.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_SEQ_02<tab>The peckish Pelupelu has been out of sorts of late. Sleep does little to remedy his fatigue, and despite the protests of his stomach, he cannot eat. The Cornservant suspects the boy suffers from malnourishment as a result of eating corn and only corn. While the cuisines your corny companion can offer are limited, they manage to concoct a nutrient-packed corn soup to help the ailing Pelupelu.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_SEQ_03<tab>Once again the power of corn has made the world a little brighter. Even so, there are yet more souls that cry out for satiation. Thus does the Cornservant set out in search of more hungry bellies.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the peckish Pelupelu.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the Cornservant.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_001<tab><rustle> Well, well, if it isn't my dear friend from Tuliyollal! I do hope your days─as well as your stomach─have been full of merriment and cheer since last we met.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_002<tab>Glad to hear it. I was just passing through when a faint rumbling caught my attention, the unmistakable sound of a belly in need. How fortuitous that fate would also guide you here. Might I impose upon you to help me once more?
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_003<tab>If you would lend an ear to the poor boy's troubles, I can determine how best to lend an ear of my own.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_005<tab>Here he is. He seems awfully distraught, a husk of his usually chipper self, I'm sure.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_HUNGRYPELUPELU05040_000_010<tab>If you've come for business, I'm afraid I'm much too tired right now.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_HUNGRYPELUPELU05040_000_011<tab>It's strange, really. No matter how much I sleep─or try to sleep, I suppose─it never seems to be enough. And despite the weird grumbling of my stomach, I have no appetite.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_012<tab><rustle> I recognize a lover of corn when I see one. The problem, I believe, is that he eats <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> corn. He is exhibiting clear signs of malnourishment for lack of a well-balanced diet.

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_013<tab>Though my dominion is only over that which is corn and kerneled, there may yet be a way we can help him. Prepared with limewater, my corn can be enriched with additional nutrients. Behold─a rich and creamy corn soup! Surely, this will help remedy what ails him.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_HUNGRYPELUPELU05040_000_014<tab>Hm? That soup will help me feel better?

TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_HUNGRYPELUPELU05040_000_015<tab>Oho! A <var 1A 02 /var>corn<var 1A 01 /var> soup! It really is the best of foods─I can't get enough of it. I never thought eating only corn could be bad for me, but there's no denying how terrible I've been feeling lately.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_HUNGRYPELUPELU05040_000_016<tab>I suppose I'll need to be more creative with my corn cooking. Thanks for this. You've given me much to think about.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_020<tab>Nothing like a nice, warm corn soup to warm the belly and the heart.
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_021<tab>Let this be a reminder, my friend─it is possible to have too much of a good thing. Even corn!
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_022<tab>But in moderation, together with other herbs, spices, and flavorings, you can enjoy a cornucopia of delectable delights!
TEXT_KINGZB011_05040_CORNSERVANT_000_023<tab><rustle> I believe our work here is done, but know that where there are those in need of sustenance, I will be there. Fare thee well!
